Sponsored by the Valliammai Society, it offers various facilities such as air-conditioned buses, hostels, banks, canteen, and medical aid among others. SRMVEC offers 11 undergraduate courses and 8 graduate courses under the college's two programs in Engineering and Technology and management.

PEC, Thiruvallur is a self-financed Telugu Minority Institution approved by AICTE, New Delhi, affiliated to Anna University, Chennai accredited by NBA and a recipient of ISO certification. The institute has received NAAC Accreditation with A Grade for its state of the art infrastructure and best in class academic programs.

RMD College is a Co-Educational engineering college in Tamil Nadu, India, funded by the Sri Swaminatha Naidu Educational Trust. It was established in 2000 and is considered one of the best state engineering colleges located in Thiruvallur. According to the NIRF rankings 2023, RMD College was placed 8th in Tamil Nadu and 258th out of 394 colleges in India. It is an AICTE-approved institution. Tech and ME/ M.Tech courses over various disciplines. Some of the salient features of the college are industry powered laboratories, start-up accelerators, and the college's own IT Center. The college provides a lot of support to the students in the form of Value Added Courses. They also have a center for International Relations, Higher Education, Entrepreneurship Development, Industry Institution Interaction, Social welfare, and IEEE Chapter.

Periyar Maniammai Institute of Science & Technology (PMIST), Thanjavur is a deemed to be university established in 2007. The institute is spread over 216 acres of land and is an energy-efficient, pollution-free, zero-waste, and well-laid campus. PMIST courses include undergraduate and postgraduate courses in the discipline of Architecture, Computer Science & Engineering, Science, Education, etc. PMIST admissions are based on national-level entrance exams like JEE-Main, NATA, GATE, CAT, etc.

At UG level, the institute provides BE/B.Tech and at PG level, it provides ME/M.Tech and MBA. Admissions to all courses are entrance based.

College_Summary: Vel Tech Rangarajan Dr. Sagunthala R and D Institute of Science and Technology​ apporved by UGC & MHRD is a Deemed University, located in Chennai, Tamil Nadu. It is also accredited by NAAC with the highest grade A++ and ranked 87th in Engineering Category by NIRF 2023. The University provides multiple courses under the Under Graduate, Post Graduate as well as Doctoral domains in Engineering, Management, Media, Technology, and Law. Admission to Vel Tech University can be done by applying online or by visiting the Vel Tech Admission Office. The selection methods of various courses offered by the university are different. In the year 2021, Vel Tech University Placement has seen excellent growth in its highest package offered at INR 22 LPA. Top corporates such as Capgemini, Accenture, IBM, Infosys, TCS, Wipro, HCL, Mindtree, DXC, TechMahindra, Amazon, Walmart, Informatica, etc., hire productive professionals from Vel Tech.

Excel Engineering College was established in 2007 by Sri Rangaswamy Educational Trust. It has been graded ‘A+’ by NAAC. The college is affiliated with Anna University and approved by AICTE. Apart from B.E./ B.Tech, the institute also offers M.E. in 6 different disciplines and various Ph.D. programs. The admission process is merit-based, a valid score in the TNEA examination is the minimum requirement to take part in the counseling process. Last year, the cutoff rank for Biomedical Engineering went up to 6240.

Muthayammal College of Engineering is a private engineering college located in Rasipuram, Tamil Nadu. It is ranked among one of the best engineering colleges in India. It is accredited by NBA & NAAC. It offers UG, PG & Ph.D in its campus. It has 16 departments in total. The total intake capacity of the college is 1110. Admission to the institute is both on the basis of merit & entrance. For UG programs, admission is done on the basis of TNEA counselling and for PG programs, TANCET scores are accepted. The college has 22% of faculty members with Ph.D. and more than 50% of faculty have experience of more than 10 years.

Aalim Muhammed Salegh College of Engineering (AALIMEC) is a private engineering college established in 1990 at Chennai, Tamil Nadu. It is affiliated to Anna University, Chennai, and is approved by AICTE. It helps in imparting career-oriented courses to all its students to acquire knowledge and skills and converts them into true professionals as per International and National Standards. AALIMEC Chennai offers B.E. across six specializations.

Jaya Engineering College, Chennai was established in 1995. It is a part of the huge Jaya group of colleges. It provides 9 UG courses as well as 7 PG courses. All the courses are approved by AICTE, New Delhi. It is affiliated to Anna University, Chennai.

KLN College of Engineering was established in 1994 is one of the best engineering colleges in Madurai providing high-quality education. It offers undergraduate, postgraduate, doctorate, and certificate skill courses. For under graduation, this college offers 7 specializations, for post-graduation, 7 streams from different courses are offered. This college also offers Ph.D. in 4 streams. MBA, MCA, B.Tech, are some of the most popular courses offered by this college. The admission is both merit and entrance based. The application process is conducted online and offline.

Kamaraj College of Engineering and Technology (KCET) is situated in Virudhunagar in Tamil Nadu. KCET was founded in the year of 1998. The college offers both UG and PG engineering courses. The college campus extends to an area of about 47.92 acres. KCET is affiliated to Anna University Chennai and got its approval from the All India Council for Technical Education (AICTE). KCET recently attained the state of autonomous from 2019 to 2029.

College_Summary: Apollo Engineering College is a private engineering college established in the year 2007 at Poonamallee, Tamil Nadu. It is approved by AICTE and affiliated to Anna University. The college offers B.E. at the UG level and ME, MBA at the PG level.

Arunai Engineering College (AEC) is a private institute established in 1993 at Tiruvannamalai, Tamil Nadu. It is approved by AICTE and is affiliated to Anna University, Chennai. The college offers B.E, B.Tech at the undergraduate level and ME, M.Tech, MBA at the postgraduate level. It has top-class infrastructural facilities and provides financial assistance to students. More than 4500 students are placed in reputed companies.

College_Summary: DMI College of Engineering was established in the year 2001 and is located in Chennai, Tamilnadu, India. The college has a campus of 55 acres of land. It is affiliated to Anna University, Chennai. The college is accredited by NBA and approved by AICTE.

Government College of Engineering, Salem was established in the year 1966 with the aim of imparting technical education among students. The college is affiliated to Anna University, Chennai. The college offers Engineering programmes at Bachelor, Masters and Research

The K.S Rangasamy College of Engineering, established in 1994 is located in Tiruchengode, Tamil Nadu. The college offers 2 courses at the undergraduate level, ie. B.Tech and BE with 6 specializations, and 4 courses at the postgraduate level namely, ME, MCA, M. Tech with 6 specializations, and MBA. Selection to the undergraduate courses happens based on scores obtained in TNEA, and selection for the postgraduate courses is done based on scores in TANCET and GATE and for MBA based on TANCET. The application for these courses is available online.

Loyola Institute of Technology was established in 2003, at Chennai, Tamil Nadu. The institute has the approval of AICTE & is affiliated to Anna University. LIT Chennai offers BE program at the undergraduate level and ME, MCA, MBA programs at the post-graduate level. Candidates can register for the courses online through the official website. The institute has also maintained a great placement record over the years.

Madha Engineering College is located at Kundrathur in Chennai. It was established in 1998. The College belongs to the Madha Group of Educational Trust and is affiliated to Anna University, approved by AICTE. The college offers UG and PG degree courses in various specializations of the engineering field. Madha Engineering College offers B.E. Course across 7 fields and B.Tech courses in 2 fields for the duration of 4 years at the undergraduate level. The college provides M.E. courses in 5 specializations with MCA and MBA courses for the duration of 2 years. The courses offered by this college are affiliated to Anna University and are approved by the University Grant commission.

Rajalakshmi Institute of Technology (RIT), Chennai is a private engineering college established in 2008, affiliated to Anna University and approved by All India Council for Technical Education (AICTE). It offers undergraduate courses in the discipline of Engineering and Technology. Additionally, the institute has placed more than 1100 students and invited 275+ recruiters. The highest package offered at INR 12 LPA. Some of the top recruiters are Infosys, Justdial, L & T InfoTech, Wipro, JBM Auto Systems, Amazon, Capgemini, Altair etc.

The college was established by the ‘Gnanathandhai’ SSM Subramaniam and is headed by the Chairman ‘Cavalier’ Dr. M. S. Mathivaanan. SSMCE is affiliated to Anna University, Chennai. SSMCE Namakkal has acquired 8th place in the rankings for the Anna University Engineering Colleges.

Sriram Engineering College (SEC) is a private engineering institute established in 1993. It is located in the Thiruvallur district of Tamil Nadu. The college has been approved by AICTE & is affiliated to Anna University. It offers B.E. & B.Tech at the UG level and M.Tech at the PG level. The college aims at providing quality technical education and excellent placement opportunities to its students.

College_Summary: Velammal Institute of Technology, Tamil Nadu is a premier private educational institution that was established in 2008. The Institute is affiliated with Anna University and is approved by the AICTE and NBA. The Institute has also been accredited by NAAC.

Knowledge Institute of Technology (KIOT), Salem is awarded ‘Best Upcoming Engineering College’ in Tamil Nadu in Sustainable Institute Industry Partnership Award by Society for Educational and Entrepreneurship Development (SEED) and ‘Best Performing Institution for Innovation of Engineering & Technology IET’ by Recruitment Analysis Council. The institute has a record of providing more than 90% placement every year and international placement with a salary package worth INR 18.5 lakhs per annum.

Alagappa College of Technology (ACT), Chennai is a higher educational institute founded in 1944. It is affiliated to Anna University and is approved by AICTE. The college offers B.Tech at the UG level, M.Tech. at the PG level and Ph.D. at the doctoral level. It has qualified faculties to provide quality education in the field of Engineering, Technology & Allied Sciences

PERI Institute of Technology strives to offer quality-based education to students of different cultures by way of career education programs. The Insitute is affiliated to Anna University and has been approved by AICTE. It lays great emphasis on offering an education that is intellectually challenging and one that reflects a high standard of performance. The college is completely dedicated to serving a culturally and ethnically diverse population. It operates with the mission of providing requirement-based education in a stimulating and challenging study environment. PERI Institute provides state-of-the-art infrastructure facilities to achieve excellence in teaching-learning, Research and Development.

Adhiparasakthi College of Engineering Arcot (APCE), established in 1984, is an affiliation of Anna University, Chennai. The institute offers 2 Undergraduate and 3 Postgraduate programs in various specializations. Admission to UG programs is based on the TNEA exam and admission to the PG programs is based on the TANCET exam. The eligibility criteria for the UG programs is 50% marks in the 10+2 in science stream and the eligibility criteria for the PG programs is Graduate degree in relevant stream. Interested candidates are applicable to apply online as well as offline for the admission process.

SRM Institute of Science and Technology (SRM IST) Ramapuram Campus, formerly known as SRM University was established in 2004. It is located in Ramapuram, Chennai, Tamil Nadu. SRM Ramapuram has been approved by UGC and AICTE. SRM Ramapuram has been accredited by NAAC with the highest grade of A++. SRM Ramapuram provides various undergraduate, postgraduate and doctoral programs in Engineering, Science and Humanities, Management and Dental.

St. Joseph's Institute of Technology is a higher education institution in Chennai, India offering UG and PG courses such as BE/ BTech, and ME. in various specializations. The courses are offered to students to fulfill the eligibility criteria of both merit and entrance based process. Admissions at the college are mostly merit-based. The interested students may visit the campus for the registration to apply for the admission.

Ramco Institute of Technology, situated in the city of Rajapalayam, Tamil Nadu was established in the year 2013. RIT is affiliated to Anna University, Chennai. The institute is also approved by AICTE. It offers a Bachelor of Engineering program across 5 specializations. The aim is to provide high-quality technical education and create skilled Engineers and Technologists who are capable of working in an integrated environment.

AVS Engineering College (AVSEC) is one of the most premium institutes located in the Steel City Salem, Tamil Nadu, and was established in 2008. The college is situated well within the town limit of Salem city and located at Ammapet, Salem-3. The college is 2 km away from Salem Town Railway Station and 7 km away from Salem Junction. It is renowned for imparting quality education to future engineers and managers. It is recognized under 2(f) of the UGC Act 1956. It is approved by AICTE and is affiliated with Anna University.

Alagappa Chettiar College of Engineering and Technology (ACCET) Karaikudi, Tamil Nadu, established in the year of 1952, is an autonomous government engineering college which is affiliated to Anna University. The college offers several courses in BE, ME, and MCA. The BE Program is available to candidates in full time and part-time mode while on the other hand, ME and MCA are full-time courses.

Coimbatore Institute of Engineering and Technology (CIET) was established in 2001 under the aegis of Kovai Kalaimagai Education trust. It is private self-financing engineering college affiliated to Anna University. CIET is approved by AICTE and accredited by NAAC with ‘A’ grade. It works with an aim to provide quality education with the best infrastructure. The institute offers seven undergraduate and seven postgraduate Engineering and Management courses.

Francis Xavier Engineering College was founded in the year 2000 at Tirunelveli, Tamil Nadu. It is affiliated to Anna University, Chennai, and is approved by AICTE. The college offers B.E, B.Tech at the UG level and ME, M.Tech, MBA & MCA at the PG level. The application procedure for admission is conducted offline. Well-reputed companies hire quality students from this college.

College_Summary: Marthandam College of engineering and technology has been established in 2006 and is in Kuttakuzhi , Tamil Nadu. MACET is approved by All India Council for Technical Education (AICTE), New Delhi and is affiliated to Anna University, Chennai and is an ISO 9001:2008 certified Institution. The goal of this college is to prepare skilled and intelligent employees for engineering industry and to make this college one of the best in engineering.

The Sengunthar Engineering College was established in 2001 to provide quality education in the field of engineering and technology. It offers UG, PG courses like BE, ME, M.Tech., MBA, MCA. Admission is based on entrance exams like TNEA, TANCET, GATE, CET, MAT, etc. The applications are available online.

College_Summary: Shivani Engineering college Tiruchirapalli is a college under the Shivani group of institutions started in 2009. It offers B.E. course in the 5 branches namely mechanical, computer science, electrical and electronics, electronics and communication, and bio-medical. The admission is based on the TNEA entrance exam. The students seeking admissions can apply through online mode for admission in this college.

College_Summary: Park College of Engineering and Technology was established in 1996. It is an AICTE accredited private college affiliated to Anna University, Chennai. It offers five main courses with different specialisations. The courses are for undergraduate and postgraduate.

College_Summary: The Chettinad College of Engineering and Technology, also known as CCET, is a private institute in Karur, Tamil Nadu. The institute offers Bachelor of Engineering courses at the UG level, and Masters of Engineering and Masters of Business Administration at the PG level. Admissions to all courses are merit-based. The UG admissions are based on TNEA counseling, while TANCET scores are accepted for PG courses. The top recruiters of the college include Amazon, Infosys, and Wipro, among many others.

College_Summary: Dhanalakshmi Srinivasan Engineering College was established in the year 2001 in Perambalur, Tamil Nadu. The college offers a highly sought after B.Tech course as well a number of Postgraduate Engineering courses, MBA and MCA.

GKM College of Engineering and Technology, affiliated to Anna University Chennai, is a private university located in Chennai, Tamil Nadu. It was established in 1996 and it has been accredited by NAAC with grade ‘A’. GKM College of Engineering and Technology offers multiple courses under the UG, PG as well as Ph.D. domains. The college provides around 10 specializations for UG and PG levels and 4 specializations at the Ph.D. level.

College_Name: Park College of Engineering and Technology, Coimbatore
College_Summary: Karpagam Institute of Technology was established in the year 2007, by Dr.R. Vasantha Kumar and is accredited by AICTE, NAAC and NBA and takes its affiliation from the state technical university of Tamil Nadu, Anna University (AU). It offers B.E and B.Tech courses.

College_Name: Chettinad College of Engineering and Technology
College_Summary: Kongunadu College of Engineering and Technology (KCET), is a private technical institution established in 2007. The AICTE approved college is situated in Tholurpatti, Tiruchirappalli, Tamil Nadu, and is spread over a land of 66 acres. The college is affiliated to Anna University, Tamil Nadu, and is graded as 'B++' by NAAC. The college is ranked 14th position out of 506 engineering colleges affiliated under Anna University based upon the pass percentage of college. It was awarded as National Level Clean and Smart Campus Award-2019 by AICTE. The college offers undergraduate and postgraduate courses in engineering.

College_Summary: Mookambigai College of Engineering (MEC), Pudukkottai was established in 1985 under the aegis of Sri Mariamman Educational Trust with the aim of imparting higher knowledge in Engineering and Technology to the aspiring boys and girls so that they can emerge as competent scientists, engineers and technologists.

Ponjesly College of Engineering is one of southern India’s leading engineering colleges. Coming under the aegis of Ponjesly Charitable Trust, the engineering college was started in 2005. The institute is dedicated to making technical education accessible for all.

College_Summary: Sasurie College of Engineering came into existence in the year 2001 at Vijayamangalam, Tirupur. Approved by AICTE and affiliated to Anna University, the college offers UG and PG level professional degree courses in engineering and management domain. There is availability of 5 specialisations in B.E degree, 4 specializations in M.E, single specialisation each for M. Tech, MBA and Ph.D. courses.

Courses_Details.Course Name: Bachelor of Technology [B.Tech] (Artificial Intelligence & Data Science)

College_Name: Kongunadu College of Engineering and Technology
College_Summary: Selvam College of Technology at Namakkal, Tamil Nadu was established in the year 2006. Selvam College of Technology has departments of Biotechnology, Civil Engineering, Computer Science and Engineering, Electrical and Electronics Engineering, Electronics and Communication Engineering, Mechanical Engineering, Master of Business Administration and Master of Computer Application. The College is affiliated to NAAC and recognized by UGC.

Sree Sastha Institute of Engineering and Technology was established in the year 1999 and is situated in Chennai. It is an AICTE accredited private college affiliated to Anna University, Chennai. It is approved by NBA and NAAC .It is accredited National resources centre for national cyber security program (NCSP). It has 2F recognition by UGC. It also has DSIR recognition by SIRO.

Tamilnadu College of Engineering [TNCE], Coimbatore, Tamil Nadu is committed towards implementing innovative teaching and applied research. It is affiliated with Anna University and established in 1984. The college is known for its Engineering courses that are approved by AICTE. The college is the first self-financed college in Tamilnadu in the field of Engineering. For admission to UG courses, college accepts entrance of TNEA and for PG courses they accept TANCET which are conducted by Anna University.

Thangavelu Engineering College was established in the year 1995 by Ponniamman Educational Trust and the TJ Educational Trust with the objective of producing high-quality Engineers and Technocrats. The rapid progress made by our country in the field of Science and Technology has given rise to phenomenal demand for qualified engineers in all areas and to cope with the demand there has been a surge in institutions offering engineering education.
The campus with well-built classrooms, fully equipped laboratories, workshops, a modern computer center, and a well-stocked library can be compared to the best available elsewhere. The College is situated in Karapakkam, 10 km away from Tambaram and 1 km from Sholinganallur, off the Old Mahabalipuram Road (IT Highway) and is well connected by road. The college is approved by All India Council for Technical Education AICTE, New Delhi, Affiliated to Anna University Chennai, and an ISO 9001:2008 Certified Institution.

College_Name: Sree Sastha Institute of Engineering and Technology, Chennai
College_Summary: Anna University in Madurai was established in 2010 and is ranked 12 in the latest NIRF ranking. It offers 4 undergraduate and 2 postgraduate programs in full-time mode with multiple specializations. Admission to all the courses is entrance based. Students are required to present TNEA scores for UG courses and TANCET for PG courses in order to secure admission to the college Aspirants who wish to take admission in the college have to register themselves online on the college official website and apply for the respective courses there. The institute is well furnished with all the facilities such as clubs, Libraries, wi-fi etc.to provide premier experience and learning to their students.

Anna University is a reckoned Institute of South India. The University has been split into six Universities. Anna University of Technology, Tirunelveli is one of those six institutions and is a regional campus. The institute offers various courses under the Engineering and Management departments. The college focuses on delivering excellence. Moreover, 65 colleges are affiliated to Anna University.

Vinayaka Missions University, also known as the Vinayaka Mission’s Research Foundation (VMRF), is a NAAC accredited deemed to be university under section 3 of the UGC Act of 1956 located in Salem, Tamil Nadu. The university was established in 1981 by philanthropist Dr. A. Shanmugasundaram as “Thirumuruga Kirupananda Variyar Thavathiru Sundara Swamigal (TKVTSS) Medical Educational and Charitable Trust”. A vibrant university with a multi-cultural experience, it got its “deemed to be” status in 2001. With the motto of “Vision, Wisdom, Unity”, the university aims to spread education globally in the fields of Medicine, Dentistry, Paramedical, Homeopathy, Engineering, Management, and Basic Science.

Vi Institute of Technology was established in 2009 and is located in Kanchipuram, Chennai. Affiliated to Anna University, it is run by high class experienced academicians from various disciplines of Engineering. The college is approved by AICTE and offers both UG and PG courses namely BE and ME.

K. Ramakrishnan College of Engineering (KRCE), Tiruchirappalli was established in 2008, affiliated to AU, Chennai and approved by AICTE. It offers various undergraduate and postgraduate courses in the stream of Engineering, Technology and Management. Admission to KRCE Trichy is done on the basis of TANCET and TNEA scores. In addition to this, the institute has a dedicated training and placement cell. Some of the top recruiters are Infosys, Justdial, L&T Infotech, TCS, Amazon, Wipro, ICICI Bank, etc.

College_Summary: The KGiSL Institute of Technology was established in the year 2008. It was established by the KG Trust and sponsored by KG Information Systems Private Limited. Located in a 40-acre campus the college also has software-related operations and opportunities for students. The college is famous for its courses in Engineering and Technology. The niche of the course program is the technical and practical experience offered by the institute. Along with classroom teaching the college also offers Moodle and eLearning facilities to the students.

IIHT Salem was established in 1960 and is affiliated to Anna University, Chennai. The Institute is also approved by AICTE. It offers Under Graduate, Diploma and Post Graduate Diploma Programmes. Admission in the courses is Merit and Entrance based.

The College is affiliated to Thiruvalluvar University, Vellore and it is recognized by UGC as well. The College is a self-financing institute accredited by NAAC.

College_Summary: AVC College of Engineering was established in the year 1996 in the Nagpattnam district of Tamil Nadu with a mission to become the center of technical and academic excellence. It is currently managed by A V charities which have been working towards imparting the quality education since 1955. The learning modules are directly linked with the R& D department in order to evolve the patterns and make it more students oriented.

College_Name: National Institute of Business Management, Chennai
College_Summary: Aarupadai Veedu Institute of Technology (AVIT), Chennai was established in the year 1998 as an affiliated institution under the Vinayaka mission university. Later it was affiliated to the Anna University, Chennai. In 2004, the institution was included in the ambit of Vinayaka Missions University, Salem. The institution is committed to impart quality education to the students from different socio-economic backgrounds. The institute is ISO 9001:2008 certified.

Akshaya College of Engineering and Technology (ACET), Kinathukadavu, Coimbatore was established in 2009 under Akshaya Charitable Trust. It is affiliated to Anna University, Chennai and approved by All India Council for Technical Education (AICTE), New Delhi. It is an ISO 9001:2008 Certified Institute. The mission of the college is endeavors to impart high quality, competency based technical education in Engineering and technology to the younger generation with the required skills and the abilities to face the challenging needs of the industry around the globe. The college is situated on the Bhagvathipalayam road 500 meters from national highway 209, Kinathukadavu, near Pollachi in district Coimbatore, Tamil Nadu. The campus is 3 km away from the railway station and 33 km away from the Coimbatore Airport.

Al Ameen Engineering College, Erode was established in 1984 under Al-Ameen Educational and Charitable Trust. It is affiliated to Anna University, Coimbatore and approved by All India Council for Technical Education (AICTE), New Delhi. It is an ISO 9001:2008 Certified Institute. The vision of the college is to evolve as a globally competent technical university and to build centre of excellence in engineering, technology, applied science and management. The mission of the college is to achieve sterling standards in academics, research and other social service activities besides being poised to produce outstanding and holistic professionals. The college campus is spread over an area of 13.33 acre and surrounded by the green environment. It is located at a distance of 10 km from Erode railway station and bus stand.

Arasu Engineering College was established in 2000 by Sri Thirunavukkarasu Dhanalakshmi Educational and Charitable Trust. It is the first Engineering College started in the Kumbakonam. It started with the aim to accelerate academic, social and economic development.

College_Name: Aarupadai Veedu Institute of Technology - [AVIT], Kanchipuram
College_Summary: Cape Institute of Technology was established in 2001. The basic objective of Cape is to integrate the analytical skills of the student and enable them to reinvent creating ideas, thereby creating Engineers of tomorrow. Cape' is the brain child of a long ventured dream of great men and scholars which has been started at the tail end of the landscape "Cape Comorin" which aims at fostering.

College_Name: Akshaya College of Engineering and Technology-[ACET], Coimbatore
College_Summary: Dhanlakshmi College of Engineering, Chennai was started under the aegis of Dhanlakshmi Education Trust in the academic year 2001-2002.  College has grown into distinguished center for engineering and technological studies. Institute strives to provide student quality technical education that moulds him into a good professional engineer.

Dhirajlal Gandhi College of Technology (DGCT) is a private college which is located in Salem, Tamil Nadu. It is approved by All India Council for Technical Education (AICTE) and accredited by the National Assessment and Accreditation Council (NAAC) with ‘A’ grade. The college is affiliated to Anna University Chennai. It offers 4-year degree courses (B.E.) in 7 Engineering disciplines viz. Agriculture Engineering, Civil Engineering, Electrical & Electronics Engineering, Electronics & Communication Engineering, Computer Science & Engineering and Mechanical Engineering (B.Tech) in Artificial Intelligence & Data Science. At the PG level, the college offers 4 M.E. courses viz. Structural Engineering, Communication Systems, Computer Science & Engineering and CAD / CAM. All courses offered by Dhirajlal Gandhi College of Technology are approved by the All India Council for Technical Education (AICTE)New Delhi.

EGS Pillay Engineering College was started in the year 1995 under the sponsorship of G. S. Pillay & Sons Educational and Charitable Trust. College has gained the reputation of being most preferred engineering college by the students. College is approved by the AICTE, New Delhi and is affiliated to Anna University. It is ISO 9001:2008 certified.

College_Summary: Einstein College of Engineering was founded in 2004 by Late Mr. Aladi Aruna, former Law Minister of Tamilnadu. The college is  offering 5 UG courses and 6 PG courses in Engineering as well as MBA programme.

Global Institute of Engineering and Technology (GIET), established in 2009, is a private institute affiliated to Anna University and approved by AICTE. The institute offers undergraduate and postgraduate courses in the discipline of Engineering. Admission in the GIET is done on the basis of the TNEA entrance exam. The institute has a dedicated Training and Placement Cell who provides 100% placement assistance to its students. More than 91% of students get placed through the campus placement every year.

College_Name: Dhirajlal Gandhi College of Technology, Salem
College_Summary: Hindusthan Institute of Technology (HITECH), Coimbatore offers B.E./B.Tech at UG level and M.E/M.Tech and MBA at PG level. The fees for B.Tech program is INR 5 Lacs, whereas HITECH fees for the MBA program is INR 90,000. Admissions to B.Tech are based on merit basis, while for M.Tech/M.E is based on the entrance exams TANCET / CET / GATE.  The admission for MBA takes place through entrance exams MAT / TANCET / CET.

College_Summary: K.L.N College of Information Technology (KLNCIT), Pottapalayam was established in 2001. The college has dedicated faculty members having vast academic, research, consultancy and industrial experience. Besides imparting quality technical education in classrooms, the teachers and their supporting staff in different laboratories, drawing halls and computer labs make the learning atmosphere conducive, inspiring and enjoyable.

MAM College of Engineering (MAMCE), Trichy offers undergraduate and postgraduate courses in various fields of Engineering such as Electronics & Communication Engineering, Electrical & Electronics Engineering, and Mechanical Engineering. It also offers a Master's course in Management and Computer Applications. Admission to UG and PG courses is based on several entrance exams conducted at national and state levels.

College_Name: Global Institute of Engineering and Technology (GIET), Vellore
College_Summary: P.B. College of Engineering (PBCE), Irungkattukottai was established in 2002. The institute is managed by P.B Educational Trust. It is a Telugu Minority Institution. College strives to achieve global identity through its innovative methods and strenuous efforts for the betterment of the student’s community. The college is committed to provide quality education to the students enabling them to excel in the fields of engineering, science, technology and management to cater to the changing and challenging needs of society and industry.

SKP Engineering College (SKPEC) is one of the prestigious Engineering colleges in Tamil Nadu. It was established in 1999 and aims at providing quality education to students belonging to rural backgrounds in and around Tiruvannamalai. SKPEC’s goal is to impart technical education and skills to students so that they become better professionals in the industry and even go for higher education equipped with confidence.

College_Summary: St. Xavier Catholic College of Engineering is a private college owned by Roman Catholic Diocese of Kuzhithurai. It is located in Chunkankadai, Kanyakumari District, Nagercoil, Tamil Nadu. The college is affiliated to Anna University, Chennai. It is AICTE and UGC approved college. MBA Program provided in the college has permanent affiliation from the Anna University.

Structural Engineering Research Centre (SERC), Chennai, is one of the prestigious national laboratories under the Council of Scientific & Industrial Research founded in the year 1965. The institute is ISO: 9001 certified quality institute and is involved in the development & research in the field of construction, designing, and rehabilitation of different structures. The institute offers M.Tech in Renewable Energy at the PG level and Ph.D. in Renewal Energy at the doctoral level. There are various modern well-equipped labs for quality research and practical education

Surya Engineering College (SEC), Erode was established in 2008 under the auspices of Sri Andavar Educational and Charitable Trust. Aim of the college is to impart engineering and management education of high standards, ensure customer satisfaction and to become an institute of repute through continual improvement.

The Thanthai Periyar Government Institute of Technology is a government engineering institution located at Bagayam, Vellore. It was established in July 1990 and is governed by the Directorate of Technical Education (DOTE) of the Government of Tamil Nadu. Thanthai Periyar Government Institute of Technology is approved by All India Council for Technical Education (AICTE) and is affiliated to Anna University.

College_Summary: Velammal College of Engineering and Technology (VCET) was established 2007 and it is affiliated to Anna University, Chennai. It is a self-financing non-minority institution. It is founded by Shri. M. V. Muthuramalingam, a Professional Engineer and the Chairman of the Velammal Educational Trust, Chennai. The College has excelled at providing a high-quality, affordable education to students of diverse backgrounds, many of them children of immigrants, working-class students and others seeking access to an outstanding private institution. The College campus is classical, high-style buildings to be constructed on 26 acres. The College is approved by NAAC.

Jansons Institute of Technology (JIT), a world class engineering college was established in 2008. It is the second venture of the Jansons Foundation in the field of Higher Education. It is committed to impart quality education & training leading to various professional degrees and aims to be a global Institution through continual improvement. The College has been promoted by the Jansons Business Group, a textile major with significant presence in Granites and Health Care. It is situated in Coimbatore, Tamil Nadu. It offers under graduate and post graduate Engineering courses

Amrita School of Engineering (ASE) is located in Coimbatore, Tamil Nadu and was established in the year 1994. It was the first center for higher learning under the Amrita Vishwa Vidyapeetham Group. The Institute is approved by All India Council for Technical Education (AICTE) and is accredited by the National Board of Accreditation (NBA). DSCE offers undergraduate and postgraduate programs in the discipline of Engineering and Management.

College_Summary: Indian Institute of Information Technology Tiruchirappalli (IIIT) also called as IIIT Trichy was founded in 2013 and situated in Srirangam, Tamil Nadu. The university falls under 19 IIT’s under the non-profit Public-Private Partnership (PPP) proposed by Ministry of Human Resource Development.

VSB College of Engineering Technical Campus is a private college which was established in 2012. The Institute is located at Coimbatore in Tamil Nadu and is approved by AICTE. The institute is affiliated to Anna University (AU), Chennai. The institute aims to make the students learn new Technologies & Engineering and mould them into future creators, developers, designers, manufacturers and leaders.

College_Summary: Bharathiar School of Management and Entrepreneur Development, a.k.a. BSMED is a premier college for management studies that was established in 1984. The college is committed to offering part-time as well as full-time courses with specializations in the stream of Management and Entrepreneurship. It offers MBA, Ph.D., and M.Phil courses. Merit and entrance based admission is offered by the college through both online and offline application facilities.

College_Summary: Stella Maris College is a Public Catholic institution of higher education for women located in the capital city of Indian Tamilnadu state - Chennai. It is an autonomous college affiliated to University of Madras established on 15th August 1947. The college is a Catholic minority institution established and run by the Society of the Franciscan Missionaries of Mary from the Missionaries form an International religious congregation of women representing 79 nationalities spread over 75 countries on five continents. The college offers a number of UG, PG and Research Courses. Admission to same is done on the basis of merit of the qualifying exam.

College_Summary: Dr. Sivanthi Aditanar College of Engineering (SACOE) was established in 1998 by Padmashri Dr. B. Sivanthi Adityan. It is running under Aditanar Educational Institution. College_Summary: SRM TRP Engineering College, Tiruchirapalli was established in 2010, is affiliated to Anna University, Chennai and approved by AICTE. The institute offers undergraduate and postgraduate courses in the discipline of Engineering and Technology. Admission to SRM TRP Engineering College, Trichy is done on the basis of GATE/TANCET/TNEA scores.

College_Summary: SRM Institute of Science & Technology, Vadapalani, popularly known as SRM Vadapalani, is a Deemed-to-be University established in the year 2011. SRM Vadapalani is accredited by NAAC and is approved by AICTE. SRM Vadapalani has associations with international universities and colleges in USA, UK, Korea, New Zealand, Switzerland, etc. SRM University, Vadapalani has brought together creativity and innovation in a global partnership. The university provides students with a unique learning experience in science, technology, medicine, and management. SRM University has brought together creativity and innovation in a global partnership. SRM Vadapalani offers UG, PG & P.hD programs.

College_Summary: Mahendra Institute of Technology, Tamil Nadu, a Private College, established in 2007 by Mahendra Educational Trust. Being a leading college in Engineering and Technology, it provides B.Tech, BE, ME, and Ph.D. courses in various specializations. The admission is based on entrance exams like TNEA and TANCET. The application mode is online.

College_Summary: Pachaiyappas College - Institution is managed by the Principals and the staff both teaching and non-teaching who spared no pains to make it possible for the college to develop to the present dimensions. It is one of the most priority choices of institution among the students and their parents from last few years. From the day of opening institute regularly performs and maintains its level of education and believes in regular improvement of quality. All the members of teaching staff and lab assistant are very cooperative and helpful. Institution is a regular organizer of events active participants in other institution events and activities. By keeping in mind, management sets financial budget for research projects of students and faculties and promotes them to be creative and interactive with latest technologies. All the members of the institution are advised to work for the welfare of the society as institution and its governing bodies are the active participants in the society. Institution curriculum is designed by keeping good health concern of the students. Institute management cares about new technologies and ever changing scenario of the world and tried to align their students with this world. Institution is well neat and clean and maintains all possible amenities which are essential for proper flow of learning.

College_Summary: Amity Global Business School (AGBS), Chennai, established in 2009 is one of the 10 campuses of Amity Global Business School, offers PG degree programs in the discipline of Management and Business Administration. The institute comes under the aegis of Amity Education Group.  AGBS Chennai offers a 2 year integrated PGPM+MBA and a 4 year GDPA+BBA course in partnership with Amity University. Admission will be based on percentage in the qualifying Aptitude Exam, Group Discussion and Personal Interview.

College_Summary: Natesan Institute of Cooperative Management (NICM) Chennai is one of the Premiere MBA Colleges under the NCCT - New Delhi. It was established in 1954 and is widely known for its Centre for Human Resource Development. NICM Chennai is one of the few business schools that provide high-class management education which is affordable for students from low-income backgrounds. The Institute’s goal is to train students in cooperative management and administration.

College_Summary: Meenakshi College of Engineering is affiliated to Anna University & AICTE and was established in the year 2001-2002 by the Meenakshi Ammal Trust, Chennai, which is a public charitable educational trust formed for reaching quality education to more and more deserving and aspiring students. The trust members are drawn from various walks of life and are eminent personalities with proven success in education, research, and teaching apart from social service.

Nandha College of Technology (NCT), Erode was established in 2008 under the Sri Nandha Educational Trust. NCT believes not only in educating the students, but also grooming characters, with moral and ethical values, thus building the nation.

The college has been established to impart value based and discipline-oriented modern technical education of global standards at affordable cost. Global Electronic Giant, Intel has signed the MOU with us through Foundation for Innovation and Collaborative Education (FICE) and Intel Intelligence Laboratory setup in the college campus.

College_Summary: Arignar Anna Institute of Science & Technology, Chennai was established in 1999. The Colleges is located in Pennalur Sriperumbudur, Kancheepuram District, Tamilnadu of non polluted lush green land which is surrounded by various industries and in peripheral of Chennai.  The institute is a constituent part of Arignar Anna Group of Colleges, which is managed and run by Sri Devi Karumariamman Educational Trust. The institute has 13 years of excellence and innovation in Technical Education. The main objective of the college is to provide world class quality technical education to inspire youth and transform their acquired knowledge for new innovation, to be an institution of excellence in Engineering, Management and Computer Applications and Research and to nurture competent and ethical professionals with a concern for society.

The application mode both online and offline.

College_Summary: Cheran College of Engineering, Kodaikanal gives good practical teaching to students by professional staff member associated with the college. They groom the student in such a way that they become autocrats and professionals in the stream they choose as their course. The college has been started by the Cheran’s educational trust and is affiliated to Tamil Nadu Government University. The college is located on the outskirts of town which gives a peaceful atmosphere for studying.

College_Name: University College of Engineering, Anna University - [UCEV], Viluppuram
College_Summary: Christ the King Engineering College is popular for its tradition of imparting quality education to the society and rendering social support with no means of discrimination. It is a well-established institution committed to impart education cum discipline to the society. Their mission is to produce disciplined and quality technocrats through the academic program of noted excellence to serve the society. Here students become enlightened individuals by improving the living standard of their families, industry and society and providing them with wide and best education that prepares them to excel in their respected professions and they become creative leaders in a day to day increasing complex world.

GRT Institute of Engineering and Technology provides world-class education and nurtures research and development. It promotes entrepreneurship and develops leadership qualities in young men and women. It encourages the youth of our country and strives for the betterment of society and overall growth of the country. GRT Institute of Engineering and Technology aims to provide value added education to its students and equip them with skills so that they are at par with the global standards. Swami Vivekananda had once said “We want that education by which character is formed and strength of mind is increased”, following him we focus on quality education that builds sharp mind and character of students. The essence of this college is established as the sole principle of developing students in the field of innovation and technology in the ambience of harmony and liberty.

College_Name: Salem College of Engineering and Technology - [SCET], Salem
College_Summary: Hindusthan College of Engineering and Technology (HICET), Coimbatore one of the leading Engineering colleges in Tamilnadu. In 2021, Outlook ranked HICET 37th among the Top Engineering Institutions in South Zone (India). The college offers UG courses in the discipline of Engineering and PG courses in the discipline of Management and Computer Applications. BE and B.Tech admission is based on the candidate's performance in the last qualifying examination. MBA admission requires a valid score of TANCET/ CET / MAT while MCA admission is based on TANCET / CET scores. The total program fee for BE courses ranges from INR 2,00,000 TO INR 4,00,000. B.Tech course fee is about INR 3,00,000 to INR 4,60,000. Check: HICET Coimbatore Admission

College_Summary: Loyola-ICAM College of Engineering and Technology is working in the field of education to serve the society for the betterment of the nation. It aims at fostering professional tecnocrats who are skilled in their work and leadthe nation with their aptitude. The faculties form the pillars of the institute, which stands high in the education industry. It emphasizes on teaching the needy sections of the society. Students are given congenial and comfortable environment to study and are facilitated with various facilities present within the campus. Faculties teach with an innovative pedagogy of teaching and learning process to inculcate interest within the students for their academics. Placements and trainings form an integral part of the syllabus for the students.
